allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Stop-Process -Name dashboard -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Stop-Process -Name polyagent -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Stop-Process -Name polyproxy -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Output ''Done''")

Bash(powershell -Command "Stop-Process -Name polyproxy -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Stop-Process -Name polyagent -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Stop-Process -Name dashboard -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Output ''Done''")
